title: Tietoevry ransomware attack causes outages for Swedish firms, cities
description: Finnish IT services and enterprise cloud hosting provider Tietoevry has suffered a ransomware attack impacting cloud hosting customers in one of its data centers in Sweden, with the attack reportedly conducted by the Akira ransomware gang. [...]

title: Watch out for "I can't believe he is gone" Facebook phishing posts
description: A widespread Facebook phishing campaign stating, "I can't believe he is gone. I'm gonna miss him so much," leads unsuspecting users to a website that steals your Facebook credentials. [...]

title: Brave to end 'Strict' fingerprinting protection as it breaks websites
description: Brave Software has announced plans to deprecate the 'Strict' fingerprinting protection mode in its privacy-focused Brave Browser because it causes many sites to function incorrectly. [...]
